text: Egton with Newland, sometimes written as "Egton-with-Newland", is a civil parish in the South Lakeland district of the English county of Cumbria. It includes the villages of Greenodd and Penny Bridge, and the hamlets of Arrad Foot, Newland and Newland Bottom. The parish has a population of 898,Office for National Statistics: Census 2001 : Parish Headcounts : South Lakeland Retrieved 26 October 2010 reducing to 817 at the 2011 Census. It has a joint parish council with the parishes of Mansriggs and Osmotherley. ==See also== *Listed buildings in Egton with Newland *St Mary's Church, Penny Bridge ==References== ==External links== * Category:Civil parishes in Cumbria Category:South Lakeland District
title: Egton with Newland
